overview: A humorous parody of Midnight Cowboy, this huge hit was filmed on-location in New Orleans during Mardi Gras. Big dicked male escort Jim Buck and his sidekick-manager Weasel are two down-and-out misfits searching for fortune. Their adventures are a hot and wild ride in the Big Easy! Jim Buck (of Dr. Jerkoff and Mr. Hard, Toolbox and Naked Highway) and his beautiful, Prince-Albert pierced cock, loads of cum and tons of humour make this a sure fire bet.
title: Mardi Gras Cowboy
